title: Business Analyst
description:
Key Responsibilities

Will be responsible for driving actionable business insights from data.
Will collaborate with business and technical teams to understand data patterns and effectively connect the data dots and provide business insights.
This is a person who sees the big picture and invents new solutions as well as simplifies existing ones, challenging themselves and others to relentlessly improve.
There will be an opportunity to work alongside business and technical teams to help shape the way we think about data models and analytics and strive to bring clarity.
Handling multiple reports, working with formulas, pivot tables & pivot charts, and various other Excel sheet components for accurate data
Emailing Reconciled MIS Reports with data visualization details using charts like Bar Chart & Pie Charts
Generating & Preparing Daily, Weekly, Monthly MIS Reports




Educational Qualifications - B.E




Preferred Experience (Minimum & Maximum)

Bachelor's degree in a Science field (Engineering, statistics, computer science, operations research, or related field) required
2 years of relevant experience in data analysis, report building, research, or similar work

Proficiency with MS Excel & SQL




Key skills required for the role:

High attention to detail and proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously
Exposure to Dashboard management
